name: David and Diana George
text: We went there to buy a long board for our son.  It is his first one and we know nothing about them.  The staff there is very knowledgeable and extremely helpful.  Outstanding customer service.  They spent about 20 minutes with us helping to pick the right board.  If you are in the market for a skate board and/or gear, I highly recommend visiting this location.

name: Marcus Irby
text: I've only been to this location. This location needs more employees who skate. Only so the local skaters might actually want to come in for more than just clothes and parts because they need them now. The employees aren't dumb, just out of their element.

name: Rekcorc Gaming
text: Prices are a little high but, great place overall.

name: S B
text: My son loves the clothes at this store

name: Exotic Topicz
text: Rude and unprofessional FOR KIDS obviously if you are use to highend retailers/fashion STAY AWAY

name: Darrius Stringer
text: The manager today was kinda helpful she could’ve showed a little better customer service tho

name: Derrick Gerrick
text: Staff was very helpful and friendly even gave me children a BUNCH of stickers

name: Jalon Baldwin
text: Tons of dope gear. Journeys on steroids.

name: Malevolent One
text: They accuse people of stealing when they aren't even near the door
